articles.author: Sporting News
articles.title: Wayne Rooney's son Kai signs for Manchester United - Goal.com
articles.description: Alex Iwobi didn’t get the rub of the green in both meetings against Arsenal last term, but Everton look primed to stun the North Londoners on Saturday.
